column5: Just wondering if anyone who fishes the Temiskaming Smallmouth Bass Tournament Series is looking for a partner (non-boater) for this weekends tournement on Lake Temiskaming. Its on August 8th.  I've fished several local bass club tournaments and am interested in trying something a little bigger. I'm no pro by any means, but I know how to get bass in the boat.  PM me if your looking for someone.  Thanks  Luc
You should try to get a hold of John at his tackle shop..  He's a good man! He might be able to link you up with someone.  705-647-0010
